categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: After the death of General Karastace Gonn during the final days of the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, Darth Vengean of the Dark Council conquered the star systems on the fringes of the Empire and the Republic in order to convince the Council that it was time for a return to war.
